reviews.review_msg: Sherry Mumford does the marking for this class and she marks very easy. I would highly reccomend this class if you need a GPA booster.
Great course. I took this class through distance education. The tutor marker prepared us well for the exam. Learned a lot in this class.

Great course!!!  I took it online through distance education. You learn a lot about correctional agencies, program planning etc in this class.. She prepares you well for the exam. With effort you can do well in this class.

hard marker for papers! doesn't give much direction with what she wants to read in an essay & will only give you tips with how you should have written your essay AFTER she has marked it. uses this as a justification for the mark she gives you. but she will help you develop your essay structure ONLY IF YOU ASK. exam & participation marks are easy

Sherry is listed as the official professor for CRIM 440 at SFU, but she was the one that did all the marking. I'm glad she did because she marks really easy. She prepared us well for the final exam as well. Take this if you are in need of a GPA booster.
